title: Sui network #1 - What was happened with $SUI?
description: In 2023 $SUI had it own ATH is $1.4. However it had dumped to $0.37. Not at all, it was completely back to ATH. WTF is going on with $SUI?. Let's find out!!!!

title: Customize your own wallet on Solana
description: If you are so boring with the address 0x0..000 in Ethereum, let's create your better own in Solana.

title: Merkle Tree in blockchain
description: The use of Merkle trees can significantly reduce the amount of data that a trusted agency needs to maintain for verification purposes. It separates the verification of data from the data itself. The Merkle tree can be stored locally or on a distributed system.

title: How to decode Ethereum transaction #1
description: By the end of this post, you'll know how to decode an Ethereum transaction in many ways.
